text: what we were trying to achieve with
Farsight was to provide predictive
maintenance on power tool devices in
order to tell them when likely
maintenance was needed on that device my

professional services what we want to do
is to stop having problems on these
devices which then frustrate the

together a solution that provided that
data in order to help customer

is it uses the Intel ups where device
and on that Intel upgrade device you can
have sensors that are connected to

certain activity events on that device
so this is just live live performer to
go that's pulling public into itself so
when we turn the toy on it will actually
display the the measurements that are
being captured from this particular
device it's a small voltage sensor that
captures things like your your voltage
to current your power and we're also
measuring rpm we collect that
information and we send it into IOT core
in AWS and at that point we can then
present that data in bash boards in
quick sight so we can then determine
using data sets you know what devices
are being doing what where they're
located how much you state been having
the reason why AWS is a great platform
for these kind of solutions is the way
that all of the service integrate
